targets.query: SELECT "reads" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "reads" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (last("get_hits") / (last("get_misses") + last("get_hits"))) * 100 FROM "memcached" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (last("incr_hits") / (last("incr_misses") + last("incr_hits"))) * 100 FROM "memcached" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (last("delete_hits") / (last("delete_misses") + last("delete_hits"))) * 100 FROM "memcached" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (last("cas_hits") / (last("cas_misses") + last("cas_hits"))) * 100 FROM "memcached" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("mem_fragmentation_ratio") FROM "redis" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: host
list.query: show tag values with key = "host" where "eff-server" =~ /true/

list.definition: show tag values with key = "path" where "eff-server" =~ /true/
